channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @Glaukopos @IronMonkeeMN @Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko @NATO If Putin wanted war with @NATO, he would attack @NATO. He clearly does not. The #UkraineWar is going to have long-lasting consequences for #Russia. War with @NATO would be worse for them. So no, the suggestion is to ‘bait’ the #Russians into (at least limited) deescalation.
@IronMonkeeMN @Glaukopos @Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko @NATO I don’t disagree. It’s a smart move, and clearly one that Putin will yell about.

@Glaukopos @IronMonkeeMN @Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko @NATO That’s what it _has_ meant in recent years, as a ‘term of art’. It doesn’t sound like _that_ kind of NFZ is being seriously discussed; the downsides are pretty darn clear. Perhaps we need different terminology to break out of past mindsets? (In future wars: airborne minefield) https://t.co/71HX59r0jU

@IronMonkeeMN @Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko That’s the conceit, right? Putin has warned that @NATO firing first would start #WWIII. He either believes that or he doesn’t. - If he honestly does, wouldn’t he think that Russia would be initiating WWIII by firing on @NATO units first? - If he doesn’t, then it’s a bluff.
@IronMonkeeMN @Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko Wait, who has been suggesting flying anything, manned or unmanned, _across the border into Russian airspace_?
@COUPSURE Gotcha. The majority of the river returns to near its original appearance in the third frame - did it all melt / flow away, except for immediately next to the bridge?

@oldblueglass @Aviation_Intel @gerrydogma Forces from @NATO / @coe / @UN can _get in the way_, and force #Russia to dare to take the first shot in an escalation of the theatre. Perhaps we should be thinking of this more like an aerial ‘naval #blockade’ or ‘freedom of navigation’ campaign than a traditional #NoFlyZone? https://t.co/71HX59r0jU
@Aviation_Intel @TrentTelenko Risk can’t ever be eliminated, but it can be managed. (Allow aircrew to opt-in to the mission, if necessary.) https://t.co/71HX59r0jU

@AugustaKlumpke @sentdefender Another thread mentioned that the anti-tank ‘600’ model wasn’t yet delivered, at least not in quantity. That doesn’t mean the factory couldn’t rush production; the implication was that only the @AeroVironment #Switchblade ‘300’ models were already in @DeptofDefense inventory.
@prayer4ukraine @KyivIndependent @Podolyak_M I though the _other_ president had a history as a comedian!
@Michsmithtx @FrancisFuturama @SalvatoreCuci11 @jimsciutto Exactly! https://t.co/71HX59r0jU

@jbc_3 @AlexandraDixon @IlyaMatveev_ That’s a good catch! (I personally have no idea, but it seems reasonable… likely hidden money on behalf of folks, including corporations, from all over the world? #PanamaPapers)
@kamilkazani Thank you for all of your writings - both the analysis and historical context are greatly appreciated!
Another great thread of historical analysis from @kamilkazani: https://t.co/PAfSfd3sfg
@AirLogic633 @UAWeapons Maybe it helps gripping against snow/mud/water at low forward speeds, like so many tiny claws?
@blowdart Eliminate time zones altogether? People (and computers) could refer to everything in either local solar time or in #UTC.
@just_conn @AlexandraDixon @IlyaMatveev_ https://t.co/wT5d2MzHpz
